page.title: 07SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: We went into the village to interview people on what{facilities}they would like in{Earith.}The majority wanted a {big store}followed by a{chemist}which is probably because the nearest one is five miles away. The same amount of people also think that the{pavements could be improved.Some people think a {greengrocers,}a{bank}and a{tow path } along the river are required. Our next survey was to see which village{facilities are used}.We found most people use the{Post Office.}Out of the two{public houses }most people prefer the Riverview Inn.The{antique {shop}was used the least,whereas about 50% of the people use the{surgery,} {butchers, Jewsons}and{Banklins } (freezer centre). Some shops aren't used so much because their goods aren't as necessary as food.
